reviewText:
I did not receive this product for free or at a reduced price for my REVIEW: The Best of Wrestlemania: Collector's Edition, includes footage from various Wrestlemania's (1-7).
Clips include: Hulk Hogan & Mr. T vs "Rowdy" Roddy Piper & Paul "Mr. Wonderful" Orndorff from the inaugural Wrestlemania; "Macho Man" Randy Savage's tournament/Championship-winning victory over "The Million Dollar Man" Ted Dibiase (Wrestlemania IV); Jake "The Snake" Roberts vs Andre the Giant, The NFL/WWF(E) Battle Royal from Wrestlemania 2 and much more!

Best of WrestleMania (P101)
03/24/91 Randy Savage vs. The Ultimate Warrior
04/07/86 WWF/NFL Battle Royal
04/02/89 Andre the Giant vs. Jake Roberts
03/31/85 Hulk Hogan & Mr. T vs. Paul Orndoff & Roddy Piper
03/27/88 Randy Savage vs. Ted DiBiase (Savage wins vacant WWF World Title)
